title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Next Block Expo | 13-24 November 2022 | Berlin, GermanyEvent Website: https://nextblockexpo.com/Next Block Expo - one of the biggest industry events in Europe - brings founders, investors and blockchain experts together to redefine & discover the future of web3.NBX is positioned to be one of the biggest web3 events in Europe - full of content formats, it attracts the brightest minds of the industry. Meet founders and CEOs of fast-growing startups, VC's, angel investors, advisors & blockchain experts that can elevate your business to the next level.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Next Block Expo is aiming to become the biggest blockchain festival in Europe:https://bitcoingarden.org/next-block-expo-is-aiming-to-become-the-biggest-blockchain-festival-in-europe/First edition will be held in Berlin, Germany, 23-24 November 2022 with more than 5000 attendees. In 4 months from now, the Berlin Station will be the most important place in the European blockchain map, linking together the most important names from blockchain.The organizers expect more than 5000 participants at the conference plus another 10 000 attending online. Venue can host more than 100 exhibitors and sponsors. Everyone will be able to listen to more than 50 top blockchain speakers.The biggest blockchain festival of Europe is dedicated to web3 startups no matter the stage of development. The event will bring together founders, angel & retail investors, venture capital firms, developers & software houses and all kinds of industry experts....
